original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 841: Drupal and AI: The Right Tool for Everything
original_content:
This week Jonathan and Katherine talk with Jamie Abrahams about Drupal, and how AI just makes sense. No, really. Jamie makes a compelling case that Drupal is a really good tool for building AI workflows. We cover security, personal AI, and more!


https://www.drupal.org/u/yautja_cetanu
https://www.drupal.org/project/ai
https://freelygive.io/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.
